name: euro-argo
title: Euro-Argo
description: The [Euro-Argo](http://www.euro-argo.eu/ "Euro-Argo") project provides an optimized and sustained European contribution to the international [Argo programme](http://www.argo.ucsd.edu/ "Argo") that was initiated in 1999 as a pilot project endorsed by the Climate Research Program of the World Meteorological Organization, GOOS, and the Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission. The Argo network is a global array of more than 3500 autonomous instruments, deployed over the world ocean, reporting subsurface ocean properties to a wide range of users via satellite transmission links to data centres.
